summary: A story of Shivani Shivaji Roy, Crime Branch, who sets out to confront the mastermind behind a child trafficking mafia.
cast: Rani Mukerji|Tahir Raj Bhasin|Priyanka Sharma|Habib Al Aidroos|Mona Ambegaonkar|Gautam Babbar|Vishwa Bhanu|Probir Dutt|Anil George|Kinjal Jain|Rio Kapadia|Avneet Kaur|Faiz Khan|Peter Manuel|Peter Muxka Manuel|Sharika Raina|Digvijay Rohildas|Jisshu Sengupta|Anant Vidhaat Sharma|Rukhsar Singer|Sanjay Taneja|Eddie Teel|Aman Uppal|Saanand Verma|D.V. Vivek|Ashish Warang|Mikhail Yawalkar
title: Mardaani
